Title: Silverlight Gadgets
Description: The Silverlight Gadgets is a collection of Silverlight simple applications. It includes full source code, binaries and demos.
HomeWiki:
Silverlight Gadgets

The Silverlight Gadgets is a collection of Silverlight simple applications. It includes full source code, binaries and demos.

Available applications

Silverlight Count Down

  • DEMO: See online Silverlight Count Down examples - Demos' SourceCode
  • DOWNLOAD: Download the latest release
  • ADD TO HTML CODE: How to add Silverlight Count Down to your html code
  • ADD TO PROJECT: How to add Silverlight Count Down to your project
Silverlight Count Down is a free simple application to count down time. Easy configuration allows to add it to your application, use with Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) or add straight to html code.
